article.Heading: Tamil Nadu theatre owners call off strike; ticket prices bumped up
article.Summary: For cinema goers in Tamil Nadu, there is good news and bad news. While theatre owners have called off their strike, ticket prices have been bumped up from the previous cap of Rs 120 to Rs 153 now after accounting for GST. CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith gives more details.
article.Body:
For cinema goers in Tamil Nadu, there is good news and bad news. While theatre owners have called off their strike, ticket prices have been bumped up from the previous cap of Rs 120 to Rs 153 now after accounting for GST. CNBC-TV18's Jude Sannith gives more details.

Watch video for more...
